entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 early in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
